GP12nardp2_u:4610: ṣaṇmāsaṃ japataḥ sarvā hyupatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ // NarP_2,41.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4611: namaḥ śivāyeti mantraṃ satāraṃ vidhinā tu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4613: pañcākṣarī siddhavidyā śiva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4614: apavitraḥ pavitro vā japanniṣpātako bhavet // NarP_2,41.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4615: pūjitāyāṃ tu gaṅgāyāṃ pūjitāḥ sarva devatāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4624: sa eva devasadṛśo bahukāle phalādhikaḥ // NarP_2,41.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4628: akṣayāyāṃ tu vaiśākhe kārtike 'pi śubhānane // NarP_2,41.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4630: viṣṇuṃ gaṅgāṃ ca śaṃbhuṃ ca pūjayedbhakti bhāvataḥ // NarP_2,41.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:4636: tato mahītalaṃ prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // NarP_2,41.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4639: yajño dānaṃ tapo japyaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca surapūjanam /
GP12nardp2_u:4640: gaṅgāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_2,41.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4642: ghṛtadhenuṃ vidhānena tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // NarP_2,41.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4649: tathaiva gopradānaṃ ca vidhinā kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4664: svargasthitānmokṣayitvā svayaṃ jñānī ca mohini // NarP_2,41.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:4666: paraṃ vairāgyamāpannaḥ paraṃ brahmādhi gacchati // NarP_2,41.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:4668: tribhāgahīnaṃ gocarma mānamāha vidhiḥ svayam // NarP_2,41.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:4669: grāmaṃ gaṅgātaṭe yo vai brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati /
GP12nardp2_u:4676: bhūmireṇvabdasaṃkhyākaṃ kālaṃ sthitvā ca tatra saḥ // NarP_2,41.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:4678: akṣayāyāṃ tu yo devi svarṇaṃ ṣoḍaśamāsikam // NarP_2,41.63 //
GP12nardp2_u:4684: gaṃmātīre naro yastu nānāvṛkṣaiḥ samanvitam // NarP_2,41.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:4691: śivāya viṣṇave vāpi durgāyai bhāskarāya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4692: prayacchati tathā bhaktyā sarvārthaṃ parikalpya ca // NarP_2,41.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:4694: yāvanti teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpamūlaphalāni ca // NarP_2,41.71 //
GP12nardp2_u:4695: bījāni ca vicitrāṇi teṣāṃ mūlāni vai tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4697: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye dānādividhivarṇanaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśattamo
GP12nardp2_u:4698: mohinyuvāca dhanyāhaṃ kṛtakṛtyāhaṃ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ mama /
GP12nardp2_u:4700: aho gaṅgāsamaṃ tīrthaṃ nāsti kiñciddharā tale /
GP12nardp2_u:4703: tathā kathayaviprendra bhaktāhaṃ tava sarvadā // NarP_2,42.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4704: vasiṣṭha uvāca tacchrutvā mohinīvākyaṃ vasustasyāḥ purohitaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4705: vedāgamānāṃ tattvajñaḥ smayamāna uvāca ha // NarP_2,42.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4706: vasuruvāca śṛṇu mohini vakṣyāmi yatpṛṣṭaṃ hi tvayā mama /
GP12nardp2_u:4707: guḍadhenuvidhānaṃ ca yathā śāstre prakīrtitam // NarP_2,42.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4712: vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta bhārābhyāṃ madhyamā smṛtā /
GP12nardp2_u:4713: arddhabhāreṇa vatsaḥ syātkaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu // NarP_2,42.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4726: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā /
GP12nardp2_u:4727: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama śāntiṃ prayacchatu // NarP_2,42.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:4728: dehasthā yā ca rudrāṇāṃ śaṅkarasya sadā priyā /
GP12nardp2_u:4729: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // NarP_2,42.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:4733: lakṣmīryā lokapālānāṃ sā dhenurvaradāstu me // NarP_2,42.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4734: svadhā yā pitṛmukhyānāṃ svāhā yajñamujā ca yā /
GP12nardp2_u:4735: sarvapāpaharā dhenuḥ sā me śāntiṃ prayacchatu // NarP_2,42.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4739: tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śāstrokaṃ śṛṇu mohini // NarP_2,42.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4745: kuṃbhāḥ syurdravadhenūnāṃ cetarāsāṃ tu rāśayaḥ // NarP_2,42.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4747: navanītena tailena tathā ke 'pi maharṣayaḥ // NarP_2,42.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:4755: tīrtheṣu svagṛhe vāpi gaṅgātīre viśeṣataḥ // NarP_2,42.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4756: evaṃ datvā vidhānena dhenuṃ dvijavarāya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4757: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vipraṃ dakṣiṇābhiḥ pratoṣya ca // NarP_2,42.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4762: pāyasaṃ kārayitvā ca datvā madhu ghṛtaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4763: pratyekaṃ palamātraṃ ca bhaktibhāvena saṃyutaḥ // NarP_2,42.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:4765: tathā guñjārddhamātraṃ ca suvarṇaṃ rūpyameva ca // NarP_2,42.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:4769: yathāśakti mahābhaktyā gaṅgāyāṃ caiva nikṣipet // NarP_2,42.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4771: oṅgaṅgāyai nārāyaṇyai śivāyai ca namonamaḥ // NarP_2,42.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:4772: etadeva vidhānaṃ tu māsi māsi ca mohini /
GP12nardp2_u:4773: paurṇamāsyāmapāyāṃ vā kāryaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaiḥ // NarP_2,42.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4774: varṣaṃ yastu naro bhaktyā yathā śaktyarcayanmudā /
GP12nardp2_u:4776: dine vāpi tathā rātrā niyamena ca mohini /
GP12nardp2_u:4781: dṛṣṭvā sva cakṣuṣā martyaḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhavecchubhe // NarP_2,42.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4784: etaddhidhānaṃ ca mayoditaṃ te pṛṣṭaṃ hi sarvaṃ guḍadhenupūrvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4785: gaṅgārcanaṃ muktikaraṃ vrataṃ tta sāṃvatsaraṃ śrīpatituṣṭidaṃ hi //
GP12nardp2_u:4786: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye guḍadhenuvidhikathanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:4788: punaḥ papraccha rājendraṃ taṃ vipraṃ svapurohitam // NarP_2,43.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4789: mohinyuvāca śrutaṃ vipra mayā sarvaṃ godānādi śubhāvaham /
GP12nardp2_u:4791: gaṅgādīnāṃ pūjanaṃ ca sthāpanaṃ tatra vā dvija /
GP12nardp2_u:4792: kiṃ phalaṃ vada sarvajña tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // NarP_2,43.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4794: patyā virahitā cāhaṃ putrahīnā vidāṃvara // NarP_2,43.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4797: devatārādhanaṃ brūhi yacchrutvā mucyate hyaghāt // NarP_2,43.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4798: vasiṣṭha uvāca tacchrutvā mohinīvākyaṃ vasurvipraḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp2_u:4799: sabhājya mohinīṃ bhūpa prāha vedavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_2,43.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4800: vasuruvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā devi lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // NarP_2,43.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:4802: vṛṣadhvajena kathitaṃ śivena dayayā purā // NarP_2,43.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4804: devaistu bhuktaṃ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne ṛṣibhistathā // NarP_2,43.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4813: naivedyaṃ ca nivedyaiva kṛśarānnaṃ śivasya tu /
GP12nardp2_u:4818: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu gandhaiśca gaṅgāyāḥ salilaistathā // NarP_2,43.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:4820: tathaiva hemapuṣpaṃ ca liṅgamūrdhni vinikṣipet // NarP_2,43.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4824: tadalābhe tu sauvarṇaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ pūjayeddharam // NarP_2,43.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4825: pāyasaṃ cātra madhvaktaṃ ghṛtayuktaṃ ca guggulam /
GP12nardp2_u:4828: kṛṣṇagomithunaṃ caiva sarūpaṃ ca nivedayet // NarP_2,43.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4830: varjayenmadhu māṃsaṃ ca taṃ māsaṃ brahmacaryavān // NarP_2,43.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4845: śivaṃ saṃpūjya puṣpādyairbhojyaṃ tu saṃnivedya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4846: kāṣṭhamaunena bhuñjāno vaṭakāṣṭena vai tathā // NarP_2,43.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4848: śivaliṅgasamīpe tu gaṅgātīre niśi svapet // NarP_2,43.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4849: paurṇamāsyāṃ prabhāte tu gaṅgāyāṃ vidhinā tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4856: evaṃ sakṛcca yo bhaktyā karoti śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_2,43.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:4858: tapaḥ kṛtvā tu niyamādyatpuṇyaṃ tadasaṃśayam // NarP_2,43.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4866: ekacchatreṇa sa mahīṃ pālayatyājñayā saha // NarP_2,43.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4867: ante vairāgyasaṃpanno gaṅgāṃ sa labhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4868: sa tayā śraddhayā yukto gaṅgāyāṃ maraṇaṃ labhet // NarP_2,43.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4869: tathā tatra smṛtiṃ labdhvā mokṣamāpnoti sa dhruvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4870: jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe daśamyāṃ hastasaṃyute // NarP_2,43.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4871: gaṅgātīre tu puruṣo nārī vā bhaktibhāvataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4872: niśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ kṛtvā gaṅgāṃ daśavidhaistataḥ // NarP_2,43.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:4875: snātvā bhaktyā tu jāhnavyāṃ daśakṛtvo vidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4876: daśaprasṛti kṛṣṇaṃśca tilānsarpiśca vai jale // NarP_2,43.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4878: tato gaṅgātaṭe ramye hemnā rūpyeṇa vā tathā // NarP_2,43.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4882: saṃsthāpya pūjayeddevīṃ tadalābhe mṛdādi vā // NarP_2,43.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:4889: dhyātvā jale yathāproktāṃ tatrārcāyāṃ tu pūjayet /
GP12nardp2_u:4893: nārāyaṇaṃ maheśaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ bhāskaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4894: bhagīrathaṃ ca nṛpatiṃ himavantaṃ nageśvaram // NarP_2,43.54 //
GP12nardp2_u:4896: daśaprasthāṃ stilāndadyāddaśa viprebhya eva ca // NarP_2,43.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:4901: gaṅgāyāṃ prakṣipetpūrvvaṃ mantreṇaiva tu mantravit // NarP_2,43.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:4909: paradāropasevā ca kāyikaṃ tribidhaṃ smṛtam // NarP_2,43.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:4915: mucyate nātra saṃdeho brahmaṇo vacanaṃ yathā // NarP_2,43.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:4918: oṃ namo daśaharāyai nārāyaṇyai gaṅgāyai namaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4919: iti mantreṇa yo martyo dine tasmindivāniśam // NarP_2,43.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:4921: uddareddaśa pūrvāṇi parāṇi ca bhavārṇavāt // NarP_2,43.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:4923: gaṅgāgre taddine japyaṃ viṣṇupūjāṃ pravartayet // NarP_2,43.68 //
GP12nardp2_u:4924: oṃ namaḥ śivāyai gaṅgāyai śivadāyai namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp2_u:4925: namo 'stu viṣṇurūpiṇyai gaṅgāyai te namo namaḥ // NarP_2,43.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:4927: sarvasya sarvavyādhīnāṃ bhiṣakśreṣṭhe namo 'stu te // NarP_2,43.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:4939: namaste viśvamitrāyai revatyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.76 //
GP12nardp2_u:4940: bṛhatyai te namo nityaṃ lokadhātryai namonamaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4941: namaste viśvamukhyāyai nandinyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.77 //
GP12nardp2_u:4945: śāntāyai te pratiṣṭhāyai varadāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.79 //
GP12nardp2_u:4949: viluṣāyai durgahantryai dakṣāyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.81 //
GP12nardp2_u:4951: parāpare pare tubhya namo mokṣaprade sadā /
GP12nardp2_u:4952: gaṅgā mamāgrato bhūyādgaṅgā me pārśvayostathā // NarP_2,43.82 //
GP12nardp2_u:4953: gaṅgā me sarvato bhūyāttvayi gaṅge 'stu me sthitiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4954: ādau tvamante madhye ca sarvā tvaṃ gāṅgate śive // NarP_2,43.83 //
GP12nardp2_u:4956: gaṅge tvaṃ paramātmā ca śivastubhyaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.84 //
GP12nardp2_u:4957: itīdaṃ paṭhati stotraṃ nityaṃ bhaktiparastu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4963: idaṃ stotraṃ gṛhe yasya likhitaṃ paripūjyate /
GP12nardp2_u:4964: nāgnicaurabhayaṃ tatra pāpebhyo 'pi bhayaṃ nahi // NarP_2,43.88 //
GP12nardp2_u:4966: japaṃstu daśakṛtvaśca daridro vāpi cākṣamaḥ // NarP_2,43.89 //
GP12nardp2_u:4969: yathā gaurī tathā gaṅgā tasmādgauryāstu pūjane /
GP12nardp2_u:4972: umā yathā tathā gaṅgā cātra bhedo na vidyate // NarP_2,43.92 //
GP12nardp2_u:4974: lakṣmīgauryataraṃ yaśca prabrūte mūḍhadhīstu saḥ // NarP_2,43.93 //
GP12nardp2_u:4976: dhanyā dehaṃ vimuñcanti hṛdayasthe janārdane // NarP_2,43.94 //
GP12nardp2_u:4977: ye muñcanti narā-prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ vidhinaṃ dini /
GP12nardp2_u:4978: te viṣṇulokaṃ gacchanti stūyamānā divisthitaiḥ // NarP_2,43.95 //
GP12nardp2_u:4980: sa yāti na punarjanma brahmasāyujyameti ca // NarP_2,43.96 //
GP12nardp2_u:4982: sā getistyajataḥ prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ tu śarīriṇaḥ // NarP_2,43.97 //
GP12nardp2_u:4983: anaśanaṃ gṛhītvā yo gaṅgātīre mṛto naraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4984: satyameva paraṃ lokamāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha // NarP_2,43.98 //
GP12nardp2_u:4986: gatāni bahujanmāni yatra yatra mṛtāni ca // NarP_2,43.99 //
GP12nardp2_u:4987: mahāṃścāpi gataḥ kālo yatra tatrāpi gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4988: atradūre samīpe ca sadṛśaṃ yojanadvayam // NarP_2,43.100 //
GP12nardp2_u:4991: gaṅgāyāṃ tu mṛto martyaḥ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp2_u:4993: spṛśedvā pāpaśīlo 'pi sa vai yāti parāṃ gatim // NarP_2,43.103 //
GP12nardp2_u:4994: gaṅgāṃ gatvā yaiḥ śarīraṃ visṛṣṭaṃ prāptā dhīrāste tu devaiḥ samatvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4996: antarikṣe kṣitau toye pāpīyānapi yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4999: cintayenmanasā gaṅgāṃ sa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet // NarP_2,43.106 //
GP12nardp2_u:5000: yatra tatra mṛto vāpi maraṇe samupasthite /
GP12nardp2_u:5001: bhaktyā gaṅgāṃ smaranyāti śaivaṃ vā vaiṣṇavaṃ puram // NarP_2,43.107 //
GP12nardp2_u:5003: plāvayitvā divaṃ ninye yā pāpānyagarātmajān // NarP_2,43.108 //
GP12nardp2_u:5006: gagātoye tu yasyāsthi nītvā prakṣipyate naraiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5013: tadasthipiṇḍaṃ puṭake nidhāya paśyan diśaṃ pretagaṇopagūḍhām //
GP12nardp2_u:5014: namo 'stu dharmāya vadanpraviśya jalaṃ sa me prīta iti kṣipecca /
GP12nardp2_u:5015: snātvā tatastīrthavaṭākṣayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pradadyādatha dakṣiṇāṃ tu //
GP12nardp2_u:5016: evaṃ kṛtvā pretapure sthitasya svarge gatiḥ syātta mahendratulyā //
GP12nardp2_u:5018: tatra nārāyaṇaḥ svāmī nānyaḥ svāmī kadācana // NarP_2,43.116 //
GP12nardp2_u:5023: iti keṣāṃ mataṃ devi śrutismṛtiṣu saṃmatam /
GP12nardp2_u:5025: tīraṃ tyaktvā vasetkṣetre tīre vāso na ceṣyate /
GP12nardp2_u:5028: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā palāyante yathā siṃhaṃ vanaukasaḥ // NarP_2,43.121 //
GP12nardp2_u:5030: siddhakṣetraṃ tu tajjñeyaṃ samantāttu triyojanam // NarP_2,43.122 //
GP12nardp2_u:5032: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu tannivṛtto bhavennaraḥ // NarP_2,43.123 //
GP12nardp2_u:5036: janārdane tu vikrīte vikrītaṃ bhuvanatrayam // NarP_2,43.125 //
GP12nardp2_u:5037: gaṅgā tīrasamudbhūtāṃ ma-daṃ mūrghnā bibharti yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5038: bibharti rūpaṃ sor'kasya tamonāśāya kevalam // NarP_2,43.126 //
GP12nardp2_u:5042: paṭhan śṛṇvannaro hyeti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_2,43.128 //
GP12nardp2_u:5044: vaiṣṇavīṃ gatimicchadbhiḥ śaivīṃ vā vidhinandini // NarP_2,43.129 //
GP12nardp2_u:5045: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye pūjādikathaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśattamo
